name: Project: Desolation A FNAF Inspired Horror Game
name_original: Project: Desolation A FNAF Inspired Horror Game
description:
Project Desolation is a Five Nights At Freddy's inspired horror game and also serves as a re-imagining of my very first FNAF fan game 'Five Nights At Blue Thing'.
With over 500 frames of animation and 2,000 lines of code this is my biggest and most ambitious game to date. Release Date : Halloween 2018

64 Bit Operating System
Memory : 4GB
CPU : Intel Core i5 3470 / AMD A6 5200  or Better
Video : 1GB
Storage :2 GB
Direct X 11
OS: Windows XP, 7, 8.1, 10

After a tragic accident that lead to a premature death you find a glimmer of hope in a long since abandoned establishment. You've scraped together what little money you have to rebuild it to its former glory. But something seems a miss with some of the old equipment and machines. Did you find this place entirely by chance? Or has something sinister brought you one step closer to your own demise.

Programming : Render Tech Productions
3d Modelling : Render Tech Productions
Sounds : Freesound.org (various)
Programming Assistance : Dragon Slumber
Fnaf is owned by Scott Cawthon
